Sequential.Optimizers

Class Adam

  • java.lang.Object
    • Sequential.Optimizers.Adam
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Optimizer

    public class Adam
extends java.lang.Object
implements Optimizer
    Class representing an optimizer that implements the Adam optimization algorithm.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Adam

        public Adam(double alpha,
            double beta1,
            double beta2,
            double epsilon)
        Constructs a new Adam Optimizer.
        Parameters:
        alpha - Initial learning rate to be used by the optimizer.
        beta1 - Initial first moment momentum to be used by the optimizer.
        beta2 - Initial second moment momentum to be used by the optimizer.
        epsilon - Initial epsilon value to be used by the optimizer.

      • trainNetwork

        public void trainNetwork(double[][][][] in,
                         double[][] out,
                         int batchSize,
                         int epochs)
                  throws InvalidOperationException,
                         InvalidDimensionException
        Description copied from interface: Optimizer
        Fit the network to an approximate mapping between the given inputs and outputs.
        Specified by:
        trainNetwork in interface Optimizer
        Parameters:
        in - Array of 3D inputs to the network for training.
        out - Array of 1D expected outputs corresponding to the inputs.
        batchSize - Number of inputs that should be in training batches.
        epochs - Number of times the inputs should be trained on.
        Throws:
        InvalidOperationException
        InvalidDimensionException
